frameworks: LocalStack (local AWS cloud emulator via Docker)
architectural_resources: LocalStack container (emulated AWS services endpoint on :4566)
Docker network/volume for LocalStack state (compose volume mapping)
Terraform-managed infrastructure under ../infra (referenced by tests via TerraformDir: "../infra")
AWS S3 bucket (created and asserted in example_test.go)
S3 bucket access logging target bucket/prefix (asserted via GetBucketLogging)
LocalStack endpoint usage for AWS APIs (http://localhost:4566 and http://s3.localhost.localstack.cloud:4566)

frameworks: Terraform (implied by repository purpose and tests)
dependencies: Terraform AWS provider configuration for LocalStack is referenced in README.md (./infra/provider.tf), but *.tf files were not present in the accessible filesystem listing; only stdout/stderr logs exist in this folder.
architectural_resources: (intended) AWS resources via Terraform (README references S3 and RDS examples), but actual Terraform source (*.tf) not found in repository snapshot; only test code references S3 outputs like bucket_id.
